title: Socially: Full-Stack Social Media Platform
description: A modern social network with real-time interactions, media sharing, and enhanced performance, using Next.js 15 and NeonDB.

title: Birdz: Indian Bird Species Classifier
description: A web app that detects and classifies 14 Indian bird species using a TensorFlow model with a Bayesian feedback system, offering 3-language support and real-time AWS S3 image processing.

title: WeConnect45: Real-Time Social Connection Platform
description: A MERN stack application enabling users to connect with random people, send requests, and chat upon mutual acceptance.

title: DebugHub: Collaborative Bug Tracking Platform
description: A Next.js application for developers to post bugs with solutions, allowing other users to like, comment, and collaborate on resolving errors.

title: WeFit: Fitness and Meal Tracking Platform
description: A MERN stack application for fitness tracking and meal management, offering real-time calorie tracking and activity summaries.

title: Decentralized Marketplace for Farmers
description: A blockchain-powered marketplace enabling transparent, secure market access for farmers and buyers.

title: VoiceGPT: Voice-Controlled AI Assistant
description: An AI-powered voice assistant using Google Generative AI for natural language processing and interaction.

title: Code Snippet Manager
description: A Next.js-based web app that allows users to add, edit, view, and delete code snippets using the Monaco Code Editor, powered by Prisma and SQLite.

title: Sorting Visualizer
description: A Java-based application to visually demonstrate sorting algorithms with step-by-step animations.
